name: Red Cube (Tucker Slack)
description:
Welcome to redcube, the game about cubes. Cross all of your cubes to the other side of the map without letting any of them get hit! If even only 1 is hit,, it's back to the previous level. Here is a quick guide:

Stone kills you, all of you

Blue wins you

Yellow speeds you

Eggs make you happy 

Cracked stone stops you

Have FUN!
